DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project investigate whether glucose response type 1 diabetes patient measure use Continuous Glucose Monitoring measurement reproducible repeat standardized test session include physical activity .
DOC.brief_title: Reproducibility Glucose Fluctuations Standardized Exercise Patients With Type 1 Diabetes - Method Study Based Continuous Glucose Monitoring
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes diabetes duration least 2 year age 1860 year ( inclusive ) give informed consent exercise ( least 30 minute intentional exercise participant feel exhaust ) one time week participant agree use CGM correctly pregnancy exercise high level ( five time week high intensity ) treatment prednisolone le month ago contestant treat prednisolone treatment beta blocker Abuse alcohol / drug
